arts.ttl: West Ham vs Tottenham Stats: LIVE
arts.sum: Follow Saturday's London derby with the best facts and live Opta data in our West Ham vs Tottenham stats page. The post West Ham vs Tottenham Stats: LIVE appeared first on Opta Analyst.

arts.ttl: West Ham v Tottenham | Changed line up announced for London derby
arts.sum: Decision time for Graham Potter against todays visitors Tottenham Hotspur. The Hammers manager has new players to consider integrating into the line up, with Igor Julio and Soungoutou Magassa late arrivals before the end of business in the transfer window. Whether Niclas Fullkrug is fit will determine who starts up front: perhaps a chance for […] Source

arts.ttl: West Ham vs Tottenham live: Spurs begin life after Daniel Levy with clash against struggling Hammers
arts.sum: Thomas Frank’s side play their first match following the former chairman’s exit from Tottenham

arts.ttl: West Ham v Tottenham Hotspur – Line up predictions, goals
arts.sum: First game back after the international break that has interrupted the Premier League and West Ham will hope to continue their upward trajectory which began with the somewhat surprising three-nil victory away at Nottingham Forest. The Tottenham Hotspur derby always draws interest and hopefully will provide a more feisty and entertaining spectacle than last season’s […] Source

arts.ttl: Latest report confirms Mohammed Kudus joined Tottenham over bitter London rival

arts.ttl: West Ham vs Tottenham: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 4 2025
arts.sum: Graham Potter will attempt to win back-to-back Premier League games for West Ham for only the second time since last February. Despite the good start Tottenham suffered a 1-0 defeat in their last game before the international break against Bournemouth.

arts.ttl: 'I left West Ham for Tottenham like Mohammed Kudus - he should know exactly what to expect'
arts.sum: Mohammed Kudus will be braced for a hostile reception when he returns to former club West Ham on Saturday, just weeks after leaving the London club for Tottenham Hotspur

arts.ttl: 'I had no choice but to quit West Ham for Tottenham – what the fans did hurt me'
arts.sum: Scott Parker was stung after being booed by West Ham fans during his return to Upton Park with Tottenham, the club he joined after being relegated with the Hammers

arts.ttl: Thomas Frank all but confirms start for Tottenham's new star vs West Ham
arts.sum: Tottenham supporters should catch their two latest signings in action on Saturday evening.
